name: ssonunii

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wi(wss(c0, con0), wcel(cuni(c0), con0)), wcel(c0, universe))

|- wi(wss(c0, con0), wcel(cuni(c0), con0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)

|- wi(wss(c0, con0), wcel(cuni(c0), con0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)

comment: The union of a set of ordinal numbers is an ordinal number. Corollary 7N(d) of [Enderton] p. 193. (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-2003.)
